value:
When I see Heroes who look like the
Emblems, memories of their strength
and kindness come flooding back.

In my world, I collected 12 rings.
With their power, and the help of my
friends, I was reborn as an Emblem.

If you make a promise knowing you
can't keep it, do you think it still
holds meaning?$k$pI believe it does, as long as behind
your words there lies a sincere wish
for the future.

Giving up isn't always a bad thing.
With time, tears of resignation can
become the burning fuel of resolve.

I just got out of bed, so to wake
myself up, I was doing some training
techniques I learned from my friends.

I sense you're the person I was sent
here for. Thank you for being a good
friend to $Nf.

I hope this makes me a reassuring
presence on the battlefield.
Good. Let's keep doing that.
Growth isn't always quick or easy.

Much appreciated. Now, is this the
change you hoped for?

Here to answer your call. I am Divine
Dragon Alear, and I will not rest until
peace reigns beneath this sky.

If you don't mind, there's something
I would like to speak with you about,
$Nu.$k$pIt's that I... I have Fell Dragon blood
in my veins.$k$pI'm not sharing this with you out
of shame. I know what matters is
what I do, not how I was born.$k$pYou're just such a dear friend,
I thought you deserved the truth.$k$pNow, I can be whatever you need:
a Divine Dragon, an Emblem, even
one of the Corrupted.$k$pAnd if you decide to become
someone new, I'll still be right here.
Your friend and protector.
I am the Fire Emblem!
Our bonds connect us!
Leave here at once!
Let me guide you!
Too strong...
I will be your ally until the very end.
Idle hands? Do what I doâ€”find a ring to polish.
I promised my mother I would protect everything under the sky. I intend to do just that.
Emblems don't usually have physical bodies. With you, though, anything seems possible.
I am the Divine Dragon, and your Hero. I will fight for you, always.
My friends are always with me. All I have to do is say, "Emblem Eternal!"
Whatever your dream, it's never too late. Mine took over a thousand years, but it finally came true.
Of course.
Steady now.
Let me aid you.
